label: SearchIndexerCache
description: Adds caching to an enrichment pipeline.

fields.label: Storage Connection String
fields.tooltip: The connection string to the storage account where the cache data will be persisted.

fields.label: Enable Reprocessing
fields.tooltip: Specifies whether incremental reprocessing is enabled.

fields.label: Identity
fields.tooltip: The user-assigned managed identity used for connections to the enrichment cache.
